alert.note: Alert for Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued December 14 at 1:03PM PST until December 15 at 8:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 1 AM TO 8 AM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Temperatures as low as 32 will result in frost formation. Coldest temperatures will be in the far western San Fernando Valley and through the canyons of the Santa Monica Mountains where isolated temperatures down to 28 degrees are possible. * WHERE...Santa Clarita Valley, Lake Casitas, Ojai Valley, Central Ventura County Valleys, Southeastern Ventura County Valleys, Santa Monica Mountains and Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley. * WHEN...From 1 AM to 8 AM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Frost can damage sensitive plants and harm pets if left unprotected.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Central Ventura County Valleys; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County San Fernando Valley; Ojai Valley; Santa Clarita Valley; Santa Monica Mountains; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys
